How to Book

Book instruments in real‑time. Do science any place. Any time.

Get on the instrument you want when you want it.
No quotes, no e‑mails.

Get started now

or learn more below

Search in natural language

Type the read length, read type and run mode you are looking for. You can also add the number of lanes or flow cells. For example; "2x 150bp, PE, Rapid."

Sign-up as a user

You must be registered with a validated payment method before a booking is possible. A credit card or Purchase Order can be set-up in minutes. Purchase Orders should be addressed to; Meenta, Inc, 71 Commercial Street #271, Boston MA 02109

Instantly book or reserve

An instant booking is final. However, the funds on your payment method will be held until you receive your data. A reservation request can be for any future date.

Send your samples

We’ve got shipping covered with our printable barcodes. However, the samples must be shipped within the required timeframe relative to your booking. We’ll track your samples all the way to data download.

Download your data from the cloud

Data transfer is on us. You will be notified once complete. After one week the data will be deleted with a quick reminder before we do so.

Book instruments. Any place. Any time.

Vetted Hosts. Quality results.

Book what you want, when you want it. No quotes. No waiting.

Not happy? We will re-run your samples at no charge.

Get started now User Terms
